title: OVER 5OOO TEACHERS TRAINED IN ICT MODERN AGRICULTURE TECHNIQUES

tasks.task: Attend a two-day teachers training program in Akwaibom State.
subtasks: Receive lectures on information and communication technology (ICT) and modern agricultural practices.

subtasks: Share learned skills with peers and fellow educators.

Use new teaching methods to inspire students towards modern agricultural practices.
